1.speaker: A
sentence: Look at this. I've got goose bumps all over.

2.speaker: B
sentence: It's getting pretty chilly in the morning.

3.speaker: A
sentence: I'm freezing to death. You should bundle up when going out.
난 추워 죽겠어. 넌 해야돼 옷을 껴입어야 해 나갈 때.

4.speaker: B
sentence: I had an accident dozing off behind the wheel.
나 사고가 났었어 졸음운전하다가 (깜빡 졸다 운전중에)

6.speaker: B
sentence: Fortunately, it was just a fender-bender.
